name: The Beginning of the Gorona
description:
This is a Gorona adventure. In this story you will play the beginning of Gorona and the vaccination process.This game can only be played on a Windows and 64-bit computer.

In the 1st and 2nd stages, you must collect 5 gold. In all stages, you must touch the sign.

In the 4th episode, you race with 3 cars. To pass the level, you need to make your score 4 and tap the sign before the three cars give 4 points.

You can access the game by paying $5.

You can get MP4 video files for $10.

By paying $ 50, you can access Adobe Animate (an) files.

Sometimes animations may not be viewed properly as a result of computer contractions. Therefore, it is recommended to purchase videos.

If I win $50, game 2 will come soon.

I wish you pleasant games.

You will play the game with the following keys. Arrow Keys: Movement Space: Jumping , Gas , Flapping Alt: Brake , Fire Mouse: Double click: Fire Left click and Hold: Move , Jump
